kitchensink.docpad.description: The entire kitchensink to showcase everything that docpad is capable of.

canvas.docpad.description: The bare minimum to get started, with a few bundled client-side libraries to make it easier.

balupton.docpad.description: The personal website/blog of Benjamin Lupton, the creator of DocPad.

deckpad.description: Build rich HTML5 presentations with DocPad.

nodechat.docpad.description:
A local chat application built with DocPad, Socket.io and Backbone.js.
NOTE: To run nodechat you must use `coffee server.coffee` instead of `docpad run`
